title: One Armchair (of a set of four and one settee)
description: One Armchair (of a set of four and one settee); Jacques-Jean-Baptiste Tilliard (French, 1723 - 1798, master 1752); Paris, France; about 1770 - 1775; Carved and gilded walnut.  Modern silk velvet upholstery; 101.6 x 73.6 x 74.9 cm (40 x 29 x 29 1/2 in.); 78.DA.99.3; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
